Posts.Content: Good morning all. As I have previously posted, I will be seeing the oncol this week and had a quest re chemo. While I realize that everyone's trmt may be different, it seems most of you rec'd a/c x4 and then taxol x4. My question is...how many actual trmts are there? Does it mean that there are 4 of each every 2-3 wks or 4 of one 1st every 2-3 wks then 4 of the other for an additional 2 wks.......am I making sense...I hope so. Seems maybe the actual chemo part may last 2-4 mos?
Posts.Title: question re length of chemo....

Posts.Content: I am new to this forum and would like to know if any of you have any idea if Kaiser does the Oncotype DX test?
Posts.Title: Anyone know if Kaiser does Oncotype test?

Posts.Content: Good morning all. I have been reading quite a bit the most women gain weight during chemo. I was wondering if this is true for any of you and if you have any suggestions to battle this gruesome fact! Thanks
Posts.Title: Weight gain during chemo?

Posts.Content: Good day to you all. Once again, I am new to this board. I have had surgery and lymph node dissection earlier this month and will be seeing the oncologist for the 1st time next week. I was wondering if any of you could tell me what I can expect? If chemo----surgeon says yes---how soon would it start?
Posts.Title: 1st visit to Oncologist 9/7--what to expect?

Posts.Content:
Hi leah.
I was alsp er/pr + and Her2-, had 1/19 lymph nodes +, IDC 1.1 cm gr 1-2 and stage IIa. I am 49 yrs old. Is this similar to you? How was your 1st trmt? Do you have a port? Follow-up meds for side effects? Sorry for all the questions, but I'm sure you know the anxiety of anticipated trmt probable worse than actual trmt itself..
Hope you are doing well.
Judie
Posts.Title: question re length of chemo....
ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
